extracted_playbook.title: Check Installed Version of Telenium Online Web Application
extracted_playbook.description: Verify the installed version of Telenium Online Web Application to determine if it is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the installed version of Telenium Online Web Application vulnerable?

extracted_playbook.title: Install Patch for Telenium Online Web Application
extracted_playbook.description: Update Telenium Online Web Application to version 7.4.72 or 8.3.36 to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Web/Browser-Based Interface
extracted_playbook.description: Disable the web/browser-based interface of Telenium Online Web Application to mitigate the risk if patch installation is not possible.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure control system devices and systems are not accessible from the internet by minimizing network exposure.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment before deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
